title: Spooky AF!! This Weird Twitter Account Apparently Predicted Beyonc√©'s Pregnancy And More!
text:
Shit!!
THIS Twitter account could possibly be the most famous psychic of our generation!
As we reported , Beyonc√© delighted the entire world by announcing on Instagram that she is pregnant with twins. But was this information already out in the world and we just didn't know about it??
Related: Celebs React To Beyonc√©'s Baby News! 
Four days before Bey's reveal, @beyoncefan666 not only predicted the baby news, the Crazy In Love singer apparently told him/her PERSONALLY!
Beyonc√© is pregnant. She told me.
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) January 28, 2017 

In a weird twist, the account actually foresaw the announcement in July of LAST YEAR! 
Okay so Beyonc√© is gonna announce a pregnancy in February(2017)
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) July 22, 2016 

"BeyonceFan666" also correctly guessed what the musician was going to perform at the 2016 VMAs !
*cough cough* vma medley
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) August 21, 2016 

But things gets even crazier! The user correctly envisioned the release of Lady GaGa 's album Joanne , Donald Trump 's presidential win, and the United Kingdom's withdrawal from the European Union aka Brexit!
Lady gaga album coming out in October
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) August 4, 2016 

Unfortunately Donald Trump will be elected president :(
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) June 14, 2016 

U.K. Voted to leave the Eu
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) June 14, 2016 

In the referendum 52% vote leave
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) June 22, 2016 

Apparently, the person who runs the account interns at Beyonc√©'s company ( Parkwood Entertainment )‚Ä¶ and is a straight-up psychic/person from the future!
being a parkwood intern and low key psychic is lit
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) July 24, 2016 

hello from the futureüëãüèΩ just to let you know america is currently crashing and burning under trumps leadership
‚Äî . (@beyoncefan666) July 24, 2016 

Before you drink the Kool-Aid, take all of this with a grain of salt. It's 100% possible that this person made all of these predictions under a private account, and made the tweets public when something big actually happened.
Either way, shit is crayyyy!
[ Image via Beyonc√©/ Instagram . ]
